item.title: By: Matilde
item.dc:creator: Matilde
item.description: Lieven, due to a silly issue the version uploaded to the archive isn't the correct one. This should have been rectified long ago but since we've been promised a referee report soon we've been waiting to have a final revision before replacing. All is well with blogging about it all you like but checking with the authors first is too old fashioned?
item.content:encoded: Lieven, due to a silly issue the version uploaded to the archive isn’t the correct one. This should have been rectified long ago but since we’ve been promised a referee report soon we’ve been waiting to have a final revision before replacing. All is well with blogging about it all you like but checking with the authors first is too old fashioned?
